overview:
Edward is the CEO of Buzzr.com, a start up developing a hosted, open source platform that will enable ordinary people, businesses and groups to create extraordinary websites, deeply integrated with social media. The company is a partnership with Lullabot, the world’s leading Drupal firm. For more information, please see Ed’s blog at: www.EdSussman.com.

Ed was previously president of Mansueto Digital, which includes FastCompany.com, FastCompany.TV, Inc.com, IncBizNet.com, IncTechnology.com and Scobleizer.com. In 2007, FastCompany.com was named best national magazine website in America by Editor & Publisher Magazine and MediaWeek.
